name: MeowMeow The Astronaut
description:
MEOWMEOW THE ASTRONAUT [MMTA] RUFF RUFF THE PILOT IS COMING NOVEMBER 8TH 2022!
 STORY:

MeowMeow went to space to find aliens then he figured out the aliens were evil! So now you are playing as MeowMeow fighting aliens with the power of kindness!

CREATORS:

This project features the talented music creator GJenx  GJenx on Scratch (mit.edu)  and the awesome coder 2SquareStudios 2SquareStudios on Scratch (mit.edu) most importantly they work together making projects as a team on StudioBlueFog  StudioBlueFog on Scratch (mit.edu)

CONTROLS:

Computer Controls:

[Click] - To Shoot

[Cursor] - To Move MeowMeow

Mobile Controls:

[Drag MeowMeow] - To Move MeowMeow

[Tap Shoot] - To Shoot
